# preservesDepth

**Instance Property**

Defines whether this layer flattens its sublayers into its plane.

## Declaration

```swift
var preservesDepth: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the layer acts similarly to the `CATransformLayer` and has the same restrictions.

Default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
